welcome_subtitle: The most advanced AI sizing tool
welcome_subtitle2: You have completed the integration tutorial. Now it's on our side. When we'll have processed your brand, the widget will be fully operational.
welcome_text_issue_intro: If it's green but the widget doesn't show up on your store, follow the steps below:
welcome_text_issue_step1_2: " tab and make sure you have followed all the steps.
welcome_text_issue_step2_2: " tab and make sure you have selected a plan.
welcome_text_issue_note_1_1: Note: if you are on the Free plan, there is a limit of
welcome_text_issue_note_1_2: size recommendations per month. Above this, the widget is automatically hidden.
welcome_text_contact_message_1: If none of the above work, please reach out to us by sending an email to:
welcome_text_contact_message_2: (email should include brand name and myshopify domain).
setup_description: Let’s set up your sizing widget. Just a few steps to go.
change_later_note: You can change these settings later in your dashboard.
settings_language_subtext: Choose the language for your dashboard
widget_style_subtext: Choose the style of your sizing widget
step1_subtitle: Integrating Popsize widget is required for it to work correctly in your store.
step1_step1: Click on the button below to open the editor
step1_step2: Enable “Popsize Widget” under Header > Add a section OR Apps > Add block
step2_subtitle: Position the widget anywhere you want in your product page.
step2_step1: Click on the button below to open the editor
step2_step2: Add the widget in your product page
step3_subtitle: Pick a plan to start using Popsize Widget
step3_step1: Click on the "Select a plan" button below
step3_step2: A new tab opens. Pick a plan
onboarding_complete_subtitle: Popsize is fully configured for your store, and your customers can now enjoy precise size recommendations, with AI 😊
brand_ready_message: Your brand has been processed and the widget is now fully operational.
brand_not_ready_message: We are processing your brand. It usually takes 24-48 hours to process it, and we will notify you by email once it's ready. In the meantime, the widget won't be visible.
